item.title: ‘Amy Bradley Is Missing,’ But the Netflix Docuseries Filmmakers Think They Know Where She Is
item.description: Ari Mark and Phil Lott share their educated theories about what happened to Bradley after she went missing from a cruise ship in 1998.

item.title: But What if “Balloon Boy” Wasn’t a Hoax?
item.description: ‘Trainwreck’ filmmaker Gillian Pachter examines the possibility for Netflix, and in conversation with The Hollywood Reporter.
